title: sephora logo font?
content:
It looks so simple but is so far from my brain. Any takers?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120415132210im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sephora_6259.gif)
author: southernroutes

comments.content: It's likely custom lettering, but [FF Kievit](http://web.archive.org/web/20120415132210/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/fontfont/ff_kievit_ot_bold/?sample_text=SEPHORA&sample_size=60) is very close.
